data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Lower Subansiri, Arunachal Pradesh, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lower Subansiri, Arunachal Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Father, help 2 new simple churches start among the 13,900 people in the county of Lower Subansiri, Arunachal Pradesh, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Lower Subansiri, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, teach the children in the county of Lower Subansiri to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 13,578 who are far from you in Lower Subansiri, Arunachal Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Lower Subansiri, Arunachal Pradesh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Lower Subansiri against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Lower Subansiri, Arunachal Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
